body_text:
Talked to @Osmose about this.  Going to be brief here.
We have a project to compare the ability of Heartbeat messages to change user perceptions.  This involved messaging bucket A then following up some time later with bucket A with a survey about various domains of sentiment.
We want a control bucket.  The initial idea was to simply create a control bucket X, skip the messaging stage, and prompt users with the survey.  However, this means that the control group just has to meet the requirements to be pinged once, whereas our test branches have to meet that requirement twice.  Therefore, tour control users would be a broader group since Heartbeat requires specific behaviors  to be triggered, namely activity and restarts.
@Osmose thinks that this may be possible with existing SysAddon functionality, but we may need to update.
@gregglind will manage the deploys for this project (called "perf .* " in Normandy's front end.
This will also be nice for user config censuses to figure out the addressiblity of various recipes.
[ping FYI @MattGrimes ]
